titleInfo.title: Will the Circle Be Unbroken Festival (17522)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the "Will the Circle Be Unbroken" Festival with the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band, the Earl Scruggs Revue, Doc Watson, Norman Blake, Vassar Clements, the Carter Family, Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys in Milltown on July 9, 10, and 11. Poster features metal photoplates of Nitty Gritty Dirt Band, Doc Watson, Norman Blake, and Vassar Clements. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/25413.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
